meanings.definition: A person who advocates or practices ultraism.
meanings.sent1: The ultraist believed in pushing boundaries in art.
meanings.sent2: She met an ultraist at the poetry reading.
meanings.sent3: The ultraist tried to break the rules in a fun way.
meanings.sent4: His bold ideas made him stand out as an ultraist.
meanings.sent5: The ultraist's passion for innovation was contagious.

meanings.sent1: Her ultraist views on literature were unconventional.
meanings.sent2: The painting had an ultraist style with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The ultraist approach to cooking led to some interesting dishes.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline looked ultraist in the evening light.
meanings.sent5: The ultraist design of the building caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The ultraist movement was gaining popularity.
meanings.sent2: His ultraist beliefs influenced his work greatly.
meanings.sent3: The ultraist fashion show was a hit with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The ultraist nature of the project excited everyone involved.
meanings.sent5: The ultraist principles guided their decisions throughout the process.
